text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump Inquiring minds wonder have you heard about this little pandemic with the Covid19 virus? Why don't you go visit a Covid19 ICU with no PPE. You might get an understanding.  Then again you are bloodline and genetics won't allow you to understand.
